text.tspan: Prior to the implementation of Flux, Comex McKinnon
was a mid-tier Irish agricultural supply chain
management company with turnover of € 108m,
handling 450,000 tonnes of product annually. Following
the implementation of Flux in 2011, the company began
to grow rapidly. By 2013, the company had turnover of €
203m, handling 1,000,000 tonnes of product with one
less employee. Due to Flux’s transparent nature, Comex
was also trading with less risk and increased profitability.
Key Facts
€203m turnover with 13 employees
1,000,000 tonnes of stock physically moved globally
using shipping and trucking with one stock controller
and one logistics manager
€400m of transactions overseen by one accounts staff
88% revenue growth in three years since the
implementation of Flux
Unlock the true potential of your
business with Flux.
How?
About Solutions Customer Service Case Study
Blog
In a world where rapid change & growth is not just possible but increasingly
common Flux is the new Big Data system designed to help.
Flux enables your team to do what they do best – create
and innovate. By digitizing all company processes,
management can monitor the health of the enterprise in
real time and free up resources to scale rapidly and
Flux is built for you. It is designed to be completely
adaptable to your on-going needs. As industry &
technological changes impact your business needs,
Flux will evolve in tandem.
Once a new sale is made, stocks, invoicing, accounts, and
workflow all update in real time without any user
involvement. The single database means that this
happens without any lag regardless of the device or
location that the sale is recorded on. Having a unified
database also results in data only needing to be inputted
once - a major time saver compared with today’s
traditional ERP systems.
All transactions are constantly monitored and compared
by Flux. If a suspicious looking transaction occurs, the
relevant user is notified immediately to assess the issue.
Implementation
Flux’s core framework is for everyone. Specialisation arises from installing industry
specific apps on top of the core platform. If Flux have not already created the app
your company needs, then this will be done as part of the implementation process.
Current apps include:
Consultation
The Flux team is also available on a consultancy basis. We
specialise in analysing processes to see if they can be
digitised and automated.
Global Access
Flux is an entirely cloud based system that is accessible
from any device, anywhere in the world, at any time. The
system synchronises in real time; if you add a sale on
your mobile device everyone in the office will see their
screens update to reflect the sale immediately. We also
offer Flux as a local server based system if customers
prefer to host the system locally.
Flux is built on a single database that enables users to have a personalised dashboard
showing all relevant activities occurring in real time on any device, anywhere in the
world.

g.text: Core components of the system reflect the requirements of any business

text.tspan: Accounts, including real
time trial balance,
balance sheet, P&L, and
cash-ﬂow
Integrated electronic
payment system
Web based HTML5
Customer/Supplier
interface
Currency management/
trading/hedging
Futures management/
trading/hedging
Dynamic trading book with scenario/
Monte-Carlo analysis
Take fully functional point in
time database snapshots for
audit purposes.
Easy Transfer of
Historical Data
All areas are for industry
specific needs.
The “Internet of Things” will
soon be proliferating
industries with sensor driven
data, Flux is built to
anticipate this.
Modular software platform
means you decide what it’s in
front of you, you shape the
system every day or every
minute as your needs
change.
Unlike established ERP
companies, Flux is built on
new, “clean” code which,
allied to a single database,
means unrivalled speed in
every facet of the system.
No screen is more than
three clicks away from
another.
Customisable per user
dashboard that supplies all
KPI’s in real time in the
background of the users
screen.
Real-time KPI’s & reports that
are filterable, drillable and
exportable, not just static
pdf’s.
Full Email & Phone
System Integration
All calls logged and can be
recorded too if required.
User Defined Access
Levels
Today’s business world is accelerating at an ever faster rate. Most traditional ERP
systems do not change from the day you purchase them, they are a sunk cost. Flux is
different - the core system will continue to be developed and upgraded free of
charge.
Additionally, we have found that once companies get
access to a digitised version of their processes and data
they rapidly develop new ways of doing things. Users
know more about their company than ever before, and
catch problems when they start rather than at the end of
a reporting period. This leads them to suggest process
improvements & additional functions to enhance them &
Uniquely Flux provides regular 6–12 month system
reviews to see where the Flux system can be further
tailored for customer needs. This enables users to
change the system to suit their changing business needs
– a large departure from traditional, static ERP systems.
Flux’s modular software architecture means that new
functions & processes can be added quickly with no
Employee satisfaction
Employee satisfaction improves as transparent
recognition of achievement becomes the norm. Freed
from mundane tasks and empowered by easy real time
access to all relevant company data, staff become
innovative and entrepreneurial.
Customer Front End Web Portal
If required you can also share analytics & data with your
customers via the web portal.
A Fully Transparent System
Flux is based on the concept that a fully transparent
workplace leads to greater worker engagement and
harmony. All user activity is monitored in real time with
user reports helping you identify your best team
members and those who require extra attention.
